article: There are times in our lives when we remember. Remembering the good things of  the past  is a most precious time; these memories are  _  in the corner of my mind. When I was four years old, I often went to a kindergarten . I  _  many toys and friends that made me laugh and cry. The teachers were  _  and friendly. They taught us many interesting songs and games. We played all day long. We did not know what learning was at that time,  _  we were learning every day. When I was  _  years old, I started school. I was very  _  because I became a school student and began to learn school subjects. My favourite subject was  _  . I remember, the first day, our science teacher told us the sun was like a big fire ball and  _  was very, very far away. Nobody could stay close to that "ball". We were quite surprised and kept our mouths open. We began to wonder at the  _  of the universe . Later on, more ideas  _  weather, planes, railways, wildlife, deserts and even pollution came to our ears. We began to learn  _  . When I was about ten years old, I  _  quite a lot of things. I began to read newspapers, keep a diary, visit museums  _  make many friends. Every day was something new. Every day was interesting and exciting. Now I am in the middle school. Each day is new to me. Happily I am still learning, which is like a journey to me. I have finished the first part, but there is still a long  _  for me to go. I hope I will become a learned person someday.
